/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a pedestrian's viewpoint on the sidewalk, immersing the viewer in the city's daily life. The street is flanked by buildings and shops, their facades adorned with vibrant signs and banners that add a splash of color to the urban landscape. A white car is parked on the side of the road, hinting at the city's active lifestyle. Above, power lines crisscross against the backdrop of a clear blue sky, a common sight in many urban areas. The image is taken from a low angle, which emphasizes the height of the buildings and gives a sense of being in the midst of the city's hustle and bustle.
